text: "Talk of the devil" is an idiom synonymous to "Speak of the devil". The expression may also refer to: *The title of Speak of the Devil (Ozzy Osbourne album) as released in England *Talk of the Devil, a 1936 British crime film *"Talk of the Devil", a title on the Previously Unreleased a 1984 album by the English guitarist Larry Wallis *An album by Master (Russian band) *the UK title of the 1965 book Rozmowy z diabłem by Polish philosopher Leszek Kołakowski
title: Talk of the devil (disambiguation)
